name: 黃瀅瑛
objective:
此課程旨在使學生了解如何把擴增實境(Augmented Reality)及虛擬實境(Virtual Reality)技術應用在製造業以及工作環境之設計，實作單元包含：人機互動系統實驗設計、Unity軟體入門操作等。
註: 本課程採"中英雙語"授課
schedule:
W1-  Course introduction & announcement 
W2-  No class (2/27 和平紀念日調整放假)
W3-  Intorduction to VR tools & tracking systems
W4-  Exercise & practice session 1: VR project (part 1/3- VR objects construction)
W5-  Exercise & practice session 1: VR project (part 2/3- VR scenes integration)
W6-  Exercise & practice session 1: VR project (part 3/3- VR scenarios applied on selected platforms)
W7-  No class (4/3 兒童節放假)
W8-  Introduction to UI/UX, HCI, ...
W9-  Exercise & practice session 2: 
W10- Exercise & practice session 2:
W11- Exercise & practice session 2:
W12- Introduction to AR/VR in industrial applications
W13- Exercise & practice session 3:
W14- Exercise & practice session 3:
W15- No class (5/29 端午節調整放假)
W16- System performance evaluation
W17- Final project demonstration
W18- Final project demonstration
scorePolicy:
In-class participation & performance: 25%
In-class exercise & practice projects: 40%
Final project: 35%
